itemInfo.itemDesc:
A simple combination of snacks. 

- Unique Effect: Life EXP Increase +5% for 90 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Cheese
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. This can be created by Drying milk received from a farm Quest.\n\n- Usage: Fish Filet Salad, Cheese Gratin, etc.

item.name: Dried Squid
item.desc: A dried squid obtained through Drying. It can be Crafted into a Trade Item at a Workbench.\nâ€» Drying decreases the value of the fish.

item.name: Apple
item.desc: A tasty apple used as an ingredient in Cooking.\nUsage: Fruit Juice, Fruit Pudding, etc.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered from Apple Trees using Bare Hands or purchased from a special Merchant.

item.name: Cheese
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. This can be created by Drying milk received from a farm Quest.\n\n- Usage: Fish Filet Salad, Cheese Gratin, etc.

item.name: Fried Bird
item.desc:
Bird meat fried with grain powder. 

- Unique Effect: HP Recovery +5 for 60 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min
